string-array.name: scriptCreate
string-array.item: CREATE TABLE [Noticias] ([ID] VARCHAR(17) UNIQUE NOT NULL,[TITULO] VARCHAR(150) NULL,[LINK] VARCHAR(150) NULL,[DESCRIPCION] VARCHAR(550) NULL,[CREADOR] VARCHAR(50) NULL,[FECHA] TIMESTAMP NULL,[CONTENIDO] TEXT NULL)
